text: @realDonaldTrump As COVID19 fear spreads in USA I'd like 2 discuss another epidemic that's swept the country for 3 years. "Trump Derangement Syndrome" Symptoms include altered reality, drastic policy change and baseless conspiracy theories. There is no cure but symptoms should subside in 2024.
